description:
net/http: add example for FileServer to mention StripPrefix
        Fixes issue 3530.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

Instead of the redirect, can you make this an example for FileServer?
More people will start at FileServer than start at StripPrefix.

On 2012/04/17 21:12:02, rsc wrote:
> Instead of the redirect, can you make this an example for FileServer?
> More people will start at FileServer than start at StripPrefix.
Sure, PTAL.

LGTM

On Tue, Apr 17, 2012 at 11:45 PM, <minux.ma@gmail.com> wrote:

> On 2012/04/17 21:12:02, rsc wrote:
>
>> Instead of the redirect, can you make this an example for FileServer?
>> More people will start at FileServer than start at StripPrefix.
>>
> Sure, PTAL.
>
> http://codereview.appspot.com/**6032052/<http://codereview.appspot.com/6032052/>
>

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=362b760ecfc7 ***

net/http: add example for FileServer to mention StripPrefix
        Fixes issue 3530.

R=golang-dev, rsc, bradfitz
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6032052

subject: code review 6032052: net/http: add example for StripPrefix, and mention that...
